name: Grave Conquest
description:
Grave Conquest is a very simple mobile strategy game where skeletons have to conquer human cities to earn their freedom.

The goal of the game is to conquer every city on the map. 

Your cities look like this : 

And the enemy cities look like this : 

Each week you produce ressources which can be used to buy units at any city of yours. For the moment we only have 2 units types (and 2 usefull resources) : a basic unit and an archer.

We also don't have human sprites for the moment so you'll fight grey skeletons (imagine they're humans).

I made a web version you can play on this page.
